com.foreach.across.modules.spring.security.infrastructure.services

Class SecurityPrincipalLabelResolverStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.spring.security.infrastructure.services.SecurityPrincipalLabelResolverStrategy
  • Deprecated.

    @Exposed
 @Deprecated
public class SecurityPrincipalLabelResolverStrategy
extends Object
    Responsible for resolving a unique principal name representing a SecurityPrincipal, into a more descriptive label or display name. Dispatches to SecurityPrincipalLabelResolver implementations. If none is able to return a more descriptive label, the principal name will be returned.

    Uses the SecurityPrincipalService for fetching the actual SecurityPrincipal, for performance reasons it will be best if the security principal cache is enabled (see SpringSecurityModuleCache).

    Note: only supports SecurityPrincipal implementations.

    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    Auditable
